text: TDE's Dave Free On Maintaining Authenticity, SZA's Stardom, and Kendrick's Pulitzer The Top Dawg Entertainment president shares how TDE maintains its authenticity, keeps all of its stars on the same page, and ascended from the underground to the top. If there was ever any doubt that Top Dawg Entertainment was the best crew in music, the past two years should dead any arguments. Kendrick Lamar was already considered one of the best rappers in the world with classics like good kid m. A. A. d city and DAMN., but his star shined even brighter after the latter album earned him a Pulitzer Prize. K. Dot also spearheaded the music for Black Panther : The Album for 2018 â€™ s record - breaking and cultural tentpole Marvel Comics
